purpose: Seed tasks to convert template-only rule_specs into concrete, metadata-complete rule registries per product

tasks.description: Update rule_specs/computeguard/00_base_rule.yml to include fields: severity, remediation_hint, created_by, last_reviewed
Add at least one concrete non-template rule under rule_specs/computeguard/ (use real example and link to product schema)
Run rule registry audit and update ai_reports/rule_registry_audit.json
Update rule_specs/computescan/00_base_rule.yml to include severity and remediation_hint
Add concrete rule(s) for computescan demonstrating remediation flow
Run rule registry audit and ensure no template-only product remains
Update rule_specs/pipelineguard/00_base_rule.yml with severity and remediation_hint
Add pipeline-specific concrete rule(s) that reference pipeline schema fields
Run registry audit and link rules to product schema sample resources
Add concrete rules for pipelinescan and document expected remediation steps
Run registry audit and ensure rule IDs are unique and discoverable
Update rule_specs/vectorguard/00_base_rule.yml to include severity and remediation_hint
Add at least one concrete rule for vectorguard demonstrating remediation_hint usage
Run registry audit and verify integration with product schema samples
Update rule_specs/vectorscan/00_base_rule.yml with required metadata fields
Add concrete vectorscan rules and provide remediation examples
Run registry audit and confirm no template-only rule sets remain

global_tasks.description: Apply consistent metadata schema for all base templates (severity, remediation_hint, created_by, last_reviewed)
Establish rule naming and discovery conventions and update registry generation scripts
Integrate rule registry audit into CI to fail PRs with template-only rule sets

notes: Prefer small focused PRs: update base template + add one concrete rule per PR to simplify review.
Ensure rule IDs are stable and deterministic to support historical lineage and drift detection.
